Name: Submarine Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Mount on a Submarine that can Jag Jump and to travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
This Submarine mount enables you to Double Jump and travel at a noticeably fast speed. Double-click your destination on the World Map and you will fly automatically toward it along the navigation route. (Auto flight is available only on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvine.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Mount on a Submarine that can Jag Jump and to travel very fast.

H.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120

h1.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120
